headline: Left-wing activists plant blue notes in Western Wall
description: 30 Peace Now activists have arrived at the Western Wall with blue ribbons and notes.    Blue has become the color of choice for supporters of the disengagement process, while orange is used by opponents of the program. (Efrat Weiss)
articleBody: 30 Peace Now activists have arrived at the Western Wall with blue ribbons and notes.    Blue has become the color of choice for supporters of the disengagement process, while orange is used by opponents of the program. (Efrat Weiss)
title: בפנים עכברי העיר, בחוץ עכברי הכפר: משפחה עירונית הגשימה חלום בחווה
